perturbation.changed_text: 2. Compensation. The Company will compensate Consultant at the rate of $400 per hour (19 hours cap monthly; anything over these hrs must be preapproved by management), payable in accordance with the Company's standard payroll schedule, and subject to withholding as legally required. This compensation will not be subject to any adjustment and will stay constant through the entire period of this agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text says that the consultant's rate may be adjusted, while the modified text says the rate will not be adjusted. This creates ambiguity as to whether the consultant's hourly rate can be changed by the company.

perturbation.original_text: Consultant agrees, from time to time during the term of this Agreement, to keep Company advised as to Consultant's progress in performing the Services and, as reasonably requested by Company, prepare written reports with respect thereto. It is understood that the time required in the preparation of such written reports shall be considered time devoted to the performance of the Services by Consultant. All such reports prepared by Consultant shall be the sole property of Company.
perturbation.changed_text: Consultant agrees, from time to time during the term of this Agreement, to keep Company advised as to Consultant's progress in performing the Services. Written reports are optional and at the sole discretion of the Consultant, unless explicitly requested by the Company in writing. Time spent on optional reports will not be considered time devoted to the performance of Services by the consultant.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states the consultant will prepare written reports as 'reasonably requested by Company'. The modified text makes the written reports optional at the consultant's discretion unless explicitly requested, and time on those optional reports will not be considered part of the performance of service. This introduces contradiction regarding the obligations to provide written reports.
